GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
platform/x86: intel_scu_ipc: fix possible name leak in __intel_scu_ipc_register()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit d4c38ee665a228663af0926c380670528d08aa63, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 54b34aa0a7295c0fc82c72c15bf42c05ad720d5f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: platform/x86: intel_scu_ipc: fix possible name leak in __intel_scu_ipc_register()
OSV.details:
